graphs.query: activity.analyzer = 'cpu' | let timestamp = simpledateparse(cpu.time, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') | columns timestamp, cpu.average, cpu.max
graphs.title: CPU usage (please select filter for endpoint)

graphs.query: activity.analyzer = 'cpu' | filter cpu.max > 30 | group Max=max(cpu.max) by Endpoint=endpoint.name | sort -Max | limit 20
graphs.title: Endpoints with max  CPU > 30% (Top 20)

graphs.query: activity.analyzer = 'path' | filter activity.percent > 30 | group Max=max(activity.percent) by Endpoint=endpoint.name, App=activity.path | sort -Max
graphs.title: Activity greater 30%

graphs.query: activity.analyzer = 'cpu' | filter cpu.average > 2 | group MaxAverage=max(cpu.average) by Endpoint=endpoint.name  | sort -MaxAverage | limit 20
graphs.title: Endpoints  with CPU Average > 2% (Top20)

graphs.query: activity.analyzer = 'path' | columns Endpoint=endpoint.name, activity.path, activity.percent, activity.time | sort -activity.percent
graphs.title: Activity by App

description:
